item.title: Best Reference Books – Programming Using Matlab
How to Install MATLAB R2018b on Windows 10?
item.description: Follow step-by-step demonstration “How to install MATLAB R2018b on windows 10”. Download Tutorial Download MATLAB R2018b

item.title: MATLAB Assignment - Session 02
item.description: This page contains your homework assignments. Please first download “Download MATLAB Assignment - Session 02”, then based on the number of your group complete your assignments. Download MATLAB Assignment - Session 02

item.title: Session 01
item.description: Reference WATER MEASUREMENT MANUAL: A guide to effective water measurement practices for better water management. Sample Report To write an appropirate report, we are suggesting to use the Sample Report file. Each team should submit their report in “PDF” or “Word Document”. How Your Report Score Is Calculated? Your final score for a report is the sum of the scores for all of the report parts: Report Score
